org.apache.ignite.hadoop.fs

Interface HadoopFileSystemFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicHadoopFileSystemFactory, CachingHadoopFileSystemFactory, KerberosHadoopFileSystemFactory

    public interface HadoopFileSystemFactory
extends Serializable
    Factory for Hadoop FileSystem used by IgniteHadoopIgfsSecondaryFileSystem.

    get(String) method will be used whenever a call to a target FileSystem is required.

    It is implementation dependent whether to rely on built-in Hadoop file system cache, implement own caching facility or doesn't cache file systems at all.

    Concrete factory may implement LifecycleAware interface. In this case start and stop callbacks will be performed by Ignite. You may want to implement some initialization or cleanup there.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object get(String usrName)
      Gets file system for the given user name.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Object get(String usrName)
           throws IOException
        Gets file system for the given user name.
        Parameters:
        usrName - User name
        Returns:
        File system.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of error.
